Parameters: ActionBar.Tab: The tab that was selected

FragmentTransaction: A @B_android#app#FragmentTransaction_E@ for queuing fragment operations to execute during a tab switch. The previous tab's unselect and this tab's select will be executed in a single transaction. This FragmentTransaction does not support being added to the back stack.
onTabSelected(android.app.ActionBar.Tab,.Description: Called when a tab enters the selected state.
onTabSelected(android.app.ActionBar.Tab,.history: Added in API level 11 Deprecated in API level 21
onTabSelected(android.app.ActionBar.Tab,.FullName: public abstract void onTabSelected (ActionBar.Tab tab, FragmentTransaction ft)

Parameters: ActionBar.Tab: The tab that was reselected.

FragmentTransaction: A @B_android#app#FragmentTransaction_E@ for queuing fragment operations to execute once this method returns. This FragmentTransaction does not support being added to the back stack.
onTabReselected(android.app.ActionBar.Ta.Description: Called when a tab that is already selected is chosen again by the user. Some applications may use this action to return to the top level of a category.
onTabReselected(android.app.ActionBar.Ta.history: Added in API level 11 Deprecated in API level 21
onTabReselected(android.app.ActionBar.Ta.FullName: public abstract void onTabReselected (ActionBar.Tab tab, FragmentTransaction ft)

Parameters: ActionBar.Tab: The tab that was unselected

FragmentTransaction: A @B_android#app#FragmentTransaction_E@ for queuing fragment operations to execute during a tab switch. This tab's unselect and the newly selected tab's select will be executed in a single transaction. This FragmentTransaction does not support being added to the back stack.
onTabUnselected(android.app.ActionBar.Ta.Description: Called when a tab exits the selected state.
onTabUnselected(android.app.ActionBar.Ta.history: Added in API level 11 Deprecated in API level 21
onTabUnselected(android.app.ActionBar.Ta.FullName: public abstract void onTabUnselected (ActionBar.Tab tab, FragmentTransaction ft)

ClassDesc: Action bar navigation modes are deprecated and not supported by inline toolbar action bars. Consider using other Callback interface invoked when a tab is focused, unfocused, added, or removed.
